text: Sundar Lal Khurana (born 10 November 1918) is an Indian politician. He was the Lieutenant Governor of Delhi from 1981 to 1982, Lieutenant Governor of Pondicherry in 1984 and the Governor of Tamil Nadu from 1982 to 1988. He was a member of the Indian Administrative Service (IAS) and was Union Home Secretary.Governors of Tamil Nadu since 1946 , (Tamil Nadu Legislative Assembly, 15 September 2008)Indian states since 1947, (Worldstatesmen, 16 September 2008) ==References== Category:Governors of Tamil Nadu Category:Lieutenant Governors of Puducherry Category:Lieutenant Governors of Delhi Category:1918 births Category:2007 deaths
title: Sundar Lal Khurana
